Public Remarks: Welcome to this stunning 3-bd, 2-ba home in the highly sought-after Berryessa neighborhood. 1,513 sqft of meticulously updated living space, this home is move-in ready, ideal for modern living. Step inside to new floors & fresh interior/exterior paint. The home ft new light fixtures & double-pane windows, providing excellent insulation during hot days & keeping the home serene & quiet. A new roof offers peace of mind for years to come. The kitchen is a chef's dream, boasting brand-new quartz countertops, refinished cabinets w/ new hardware, & a convenient kitchen island perfect for family gatherings or casual dining. The open kitchen flows into the family room, perfect for cozy evenings by the fireplace. Updated bathrooms w. new vanities and freshly epoxied showers. This home offers 2 spacious guest bds & an expansive primary bd updated w/ recessed lighting. The 2-car garage fits all your parking needs. Close to Penitencia Creek Park, you'll have easy access to recreational activities. For shopping & dining, Berryessa Corners is just a short drive away. Also, the home is near the Berryessa VTA station & I-680, connecting you to Highways 101 & 280, making commutes to SF or further south a breeze. Don't miss the chance to own this beautifully updated home in the heart of Berryessa.
Showing Instruction: Lockbox - Supra iBox Bluetooth LE

Public Remarks: Gorgeous one-story, 3 bedroom 2 bathroom home with views of the surrounding foothills. A nice size yard with water-efficient landscaping in both the front and back yards is perfect for a children's play area or entertainment. Two-car garage with plenty of off-street parking. All new interior paint, baseboards, carpets, interior doors, light fixtures, water heater, and dual pane windows are some of the home improvements. The house has an open-concept living room, kitchen, and dining area. A separate family room with a brick fireplace wall and a sliding glass door invite you to a low-maintenance private backyard with matured fruit trees. Bright and spacious master bedroom with double closets. Central AC and heating. Convenient access to major freeways, transportation, the new Costco, Villa Sport Athletic Club, Capitol Square Mall, Penitencia Creek County Park, and Alum Rock park, and many tech companies like Amazon, Google, Apple Campus in N. San Jose. Come and find your dream house!
Showing Instruction: Easy to make an appointment. Please call me.

Confidential Remarks: The homeowner is eager to consider offers & is truly motivated to sell this property. Please be aware that the home is being sold as-is condition. It might be a bit messy and cluttered. Please check comps. Seller is motivated but will not consider any offers under asking price at this time. The homeowner is often at home, although he may not always be readily available to respond. Please reach out to Bill first at 408-963-3525 via text or phone call. Please do not show unless you have received confirmation of an appointment. If you have potential buyers who are interested, we would like to invite them to the open house on Saturday, 10/21, 1 to 4. All necessary disclosures are available through this link: https://app.disclosures.io/link/2859-Mabury-Road-2n4bc49h. Additionally, the homeowner is willing to consider leaving behind some of the furniture or TVs, with the exception of a few items. Your understanding and patience during this process are greatly appreciated.
Public Remarks: Discover the hidden potential within this home! While the property may appear a bit untidy at the moment, it's a blank canvas waiting for your creative touch. Key Features: Crown molding & recessed lighting for an elegant touch. Wainscoting through out. Custom fireplace. Custom kitchen w/heavy-duty stainless steel appliances & granite counters with a large island for meal prep. Beautiful wood floors that add warmth & character. A unique tri-level design w/custom features throughout. Upgraded front door. The Seller is actively working on cleaning up & decluttering. Being strictly sold 'As-is,' this property presents a fantastic opportunity for those willing to put in some effort & add their personal touches. In fact, many items will remain with the home, including an entertainment system w/TV, washer, dryer, fridge & more making this deal even sweeter. Your dream home might just be a few finishing touches away. Don't miss out on this exciting opportunity to create your perfect space.
Showing Instruction: Strict by appointment only Please text owner and he will respond

Public Remarks: Welcome to this spacious 1449 sq ft. 3 bed 2 bath SFR with fresh paint inside and out & a great floorplan. The house has space for family & friends or peaceful solitude. Well positioned on a private cul-de-sac in the popular Baton Rouge neighborhood. Enter a light-filled living room with beautiful windows & wander into the separate dining area adjacent to the open kitchen. The separate family room has access to the attached 2-car garage, laundry area, & storage space, & sliding doors to the impressive sunroom with space to entertain or soak up the warm sunshine. The 6481 sq. ft. lot includes a large backyard with mature trees, landscaping, decking, and a patio perfect for parties, sunsets, stargazing, or a dream garden. Ideally located in the heart of North San Jose with easy access to 680, 101, Berryessa Bart, shopping, dining, a High-end Athletic Club and Spa, and only 2.5 miles to Alum Rock Park with many trails & beautiful views. This a property you don't want to miss!

This cozy home boasts a prime location near schools and shopping centers, offering convenience at your doorstep. Featuring new floors and fresh paint throughout, complemented by remodeled baths. Outside, the spacious backyard awaits your personal touch, while the low-maintenance front yard showcases a nicely manicured lawn. Enjoy easy access to multiple freeways from this central location, walking distance to Independence High School, Berryessa BART station making it ideal for commuters. Public Remarks: Welcome to this captivating light-filled 2-story home in Berryessa! This meticulously maintained home offers a perfect blend of luxury & comfort. The elegant double door entrance leads to a large formal living room showcasing vaulted ceilings with attached formal dining room. Meanwhile a separate family room off of the kitchen features laminate flooring, a fireplace, & a wet bar perfect for entertaining. Indulge in outdoor living at its finest with a gorgeous outdoor kitchen featuring a built-in propane BBQ, granite counters, a mini fridge, & bar seating, nestled beneath a beautiful wood pergola. The custom backyard has high-end pavers that line the lush grass, & a built-in awning create the ideal ambiance for al fresco dining & entertaining. The open kitchen overlooks the backyard oasis, and features granite counters, recessed lighting, SS appliances, & dual ovens. Retreat to the spacious primary bedroom with a vaulted ceiling, two closets & dual vanity. Add'l highlights include fresh interior paint, dual pane windows with plantation shutters throughout, central heat & AC, security camera system, & an abundance of extra storage. Conveniently located near Piedmont Middle & Piedmont Hills High School, Penitencia Creek Park, Lightrail Station, & easy freeway access and shopping!
Showing Instruction: Appointment Only,Call First

Public Remarks: Welcome to 712 Salt Lake Drive, nestled in the serene foothills of San Jose, just off Mabury Road! This stylish and spacious 4-bedroom 2-bath single-family abode promises comfortable living at its finest. As you step inside, you'll enter a large foyer that leads to your dining room and formal living room. The layout boasts a thoughtful design with separate living and a spacious family room / great room. The large kitchen is adorned with new cabinets, stainless steel appliances, and stunning quartz countertops with a large central island with pendant lighting and a breakfast bar. Bedrooms are spacious and feature sliding door closets. The primary bedroom features his and her closets, a sliding glass door to the backyard, and a remodeled private ensuite bath with a large stall shower and dual vanity. Additional features include inside laundry, central heating, dual pane windows, LVP flooring throughout, LED recessed lighting, two sliding glass doors leading to the backyard, 2 car car-attached garage with automatic opener, copper plumbing, and a 50-year presidential composition roof.
